title: Life Isn't Perfect... But Your Apartment Can Be!!
posting_body: ['FIND YOUR ADVENTURE', 'Live inspired.', 'That’s our mantra here at Sunstone, and it just means that we believe life should be lived in abundance – full, big, and with intention.', 'In honor of that, we blend an elevated living experience with an easy-going, relaxed atmosphere that encourages you to live life the way you live life.', 'Period.', 'Settle into one of our one, two, or three-bedroom apartment homes and discover what a life of abundance really means.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 28', 'OR Text', '28', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1026 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Designer Lighting Package*', '- Oversized Closets', '- Highly-Efficient Central A/C', '- Prewired Intrusion Alarms', '- Disability Access*', '- Premium Flooring*', '- Newly Remodeled Interiors', '- Homes WiFi ready with pre-installed modem and 1st month free, provided by Cox.', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Full-Size Washer and Dryer', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Designer Plumbing Package*', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities', '- 24-Hour Fitness Center', '- Covered Parking', '- 24-Hour Maintenance', '- Gas Grilling Stations', '- Picnic Areas', '- Media Lounge with Free WiFi', '- We Love Pets!*', '- Amazon Hub Lockers', '- Minutes from Downtown, Shopping Centers and Entertainment', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool & Relaxing Spa', '- Individual Private Garages*', '- Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunstone', '9353 West Twain Avenue, Las Vegas, NV, 89147', 'D1HXGbkbkH7F']
